lead_paragraph: RISEMAN--Milton, January 24, 2016, of Radnor, PA. Beloved husband of Judith (nee Schechtman); loving father of Alex (Lori) Riseman and Samantha (Collin) Conoley; cherished grandfather of Ariel, Sophia, Matthew, Declan and Nola. Relatives and friends are invited to graveside services Wednesday 1:00pm, Sharon Gardens, 273 Lakeview Avenue, Valhalla, NY 10595. Shiva will be observed at the late residence. In lieu of flowers, contributions in his memory may be made to The Multiple Myeloma Research Foundation (MMRF) or The Melanoma International Foundation (MIF). 1/3
